org.apache.flink.graph.gsa

类 GSAConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.IterationConfiguration
      • org.apache.flink.graph.gsa.GSAConfiguration

  • public class GSAConfiguration
extends IterationConfiguration
    A GSAConfiguration object can be used to set the iteration name and degree of parallelism, to register aggregators and use broadcast sets in the GatherFunction, SumFunction as well as ApplyFunction. The GSAConfiguration object is passed as an argument to Graph.runGatherSumApplyIteration(org.apache.flink.graph.gsa.GatherFunction, org.apache.flink.graph.gsa.SumFunction, org.apache.flink.graph.gsa.ApplyFunction, int)

      • addBroadcastSetForGatherFunction

        public void addBroadcastSetForGatherFunction(String name,
                                             org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<?> data)
        Adds a data set as a broadcast set to the gather function.
        参数:
        name - The name under which the broadcast data is available in the gather function.
        data - The data set to be broadcasted.

      • addBroadcastSetForSumFunction

        public void addBroadcastSetForSumFunction(String name,
                                          org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<?> data)
        Adds a data set as a broadcast set to the sum function.
        参数:
        name - The name under which the broadcast data is available in the sum function.
        data - The data set to be broadcasted.

      • addBroadcastSetForApplyFunction

      • getGatherBcastVars

        public List<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple2<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<?>>> getGatherBcastVars()
        Get the broadcast variables of the GatherFunction.
        返回:
        a List of Tuple2, where the first field is the broadcast variable name and the second field is the broadcast DataSet.

      • getDirection

        public EdgeDirection getDirection()
        Gets the direction from which the neighbors are to be selected By default the neighbors who are target of the edges are selected
        返回:
        an EdgeDirection, which can be either IN, OUT or ALL.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(EdgeDirection direction)
        Sets the direction in which neighbors are to be selected By default the neighbors who are target of the edges are selected
        参数:
        direction - - IN, OUT or ALL
